text: HC Sporta Hlohovec is a Slovakian handball team located in Hlohovec. Their home matches are played at the Sportová Hala Na Zábran. They compete in Extraliga. == Club names == * 1951 – 1999 : TJ Odeva Hlohovec * 1963 – 1993 : TJ Drôtovňa Hlohovec * 1999 – 2011 : MŠK Hlohovec * since 2011 : HC SPORTA Hlohovec ==Accomplishments== *Extraliga: **Runners Up (1) : 2010, 2012, 2013 ==European record == {| class="wikitable" !
